statements: UPDATE RiskMetrics SET buy_quantity = 100, sell_quantity = 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE RiskMetrics SET risk_score = 5.8, trading_strategy = 'Momentum' WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE RiskMetrics SET buy_quantity = 100, sell_quantity = 50 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE RiskMetrics SET risk_score = 8.0, trading_strategy = 'Long-Term Hold' WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL'
UPDATE RiskMetrics SET alpha = 0.5 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE TradingAlgorithms SET description = 'Trend Following Strategy' WHERE id = 3
UPDATE RiskMetrics SET alpha=0.5, beta=0.6 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE TradingAlgorithms SET name='Algorithm A', parameters='{"parameter1": 10, "parameter2": 20}', description='New trading algorithm based on advanced strategy' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE RiskMetrics SET volatility = 15.75 WHERE id = 1001;
UPDATE TradeOrders SET quantity = 500, price = 25.50 WHERE order_id = 2002;
UPDATE RiskMetrics SET volatility = 15.75 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE TradeOrders SET price = 100.50, quantity = 200 WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' AND order_type = 'BUY';
UPDATE risk_metrics SET risk_value = 15.75 WHERE risk_id = 1;
UPDATE trading_strategies SET strategy_description = 'Short-term trading' WHERE strategy_id = 2;
UPDATE risk_metrics SET risk_value = 15.75, timestamp = '2021-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE risk_id = 1;
UPDATE trade_executions SET quantity = 100, executed_price = 20.50, execution_timestamp = '2021-10-16 10:45:00' WHERE execution_id = 5;
UPDATE RiskMetrics SET metric_value = 10.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE TradingAlgorithms SET algorithm_type = 'Technical' WHERE algorithm_id = 2;
UPDATE RiskMetrics SET metric_value = 0.5 WHERE metric_name = 'Volatility'
UPDATE TradeExecution SET price = 100.25, volume = 500 WHERE trade_id = 12345
